resources.string: You have certain figures on the screen with different characteristics (For example, blue triangle, orange square, etc.), we will call them objects. When the game starts, you will have on the screen objects with certain characteristics appear. Your task, depending on the object that appears, is to click on one of your own according to one of the conditions:\\n* If you have an object that fully matches the one that appeared, you must select the same object \\n* If you do not have exactly the same object, you must select the object which will differ in all respects from the appeared
